CME Group พิจารณาเปิดตัว Crypto Token

CME Group Considers Crypto Token Launch

2d ago//Squiffs
general
AI

Summary

TH

CME Group ซึ่งเป็นตลาดสินเชื่อฟิวเจอร์สและออปชันที่ใหญ่ที่สุดในโลกกำลังพิจารณาเปิดตัวโทเค็นคริปโตของตัวเองในขณะที่ขยายตลาดคริปโต ในการประชุมเชิงกลยุทธ์ CEO ของ CME ได้กล่าวถึงแผนสำหรับหลักทรัพย์ที่เป็นโทเค็นและเน้นความสำคัญของความสมบูรณ์ของหลักทรัพย์ พร้อมยืนยันว่าธุรกรรมฟิวเจอร์สคริปโต 24/7 จะเปิดให้บริการในเดี๋ยวนี้ บริษััตถุ์กำลังพิจารณาหลายวิธี รวมถึงเงินสดที่เป็นโทเค็นและการเปิดตัวเหรียญของตัวเองบนเครือข่ายที่กระจายอำนาจ

EN

CME Group, the world's largest derivatives marketplace, is exploring the launch of its own crypto token as it expands further into crypto markets. During an earnings call, CEO Terrence Duffy discussed plans for tokenized collateral and emphasized the importance of collateral integrity, while confirming that 24/7 crypto futures trading will soon be available on CME. The company is considering multiple approaches, including tokenized cash and potentially launching their own coin on a decentralized network for industry participants, all while maintaining strict risk management protocols.

Key Points

  • CME Group exploring its own crypto token launch as it expands into crypto markets
  • Company considering tokenized cash and potentially a decentralized coin for industry participants
  • 2025 was a record-breaking year for CME's crypto trading with Q4 volume up 92% to $13 billion

Article

The world’s largest futures and options marketplace is exploring ‘tokenized cash’ as it leans further into crypto markets. CME Group , the largest derivatives trading marketplace in the world, is looking at launching its own crypto token. During the company’s earnings call today, Chairman and CEO Terrence Duffy discussed the role of tokenized collateral and the importance of collateral integrity, with 24/7 crypto futures trading confirmed to be coming to CME soon. “Right now, we are looking at different forms of margin, but we are not going to put the enterprise at risk by taking something that we cannot get our arms around on a token. So if you were to give me a token from a systemically important financial institution, I would probably be more comfortable than maybe a third or fourth-tier bank trying to issue a token for margin,” he said. “So not only are we looking at tokenized cash, obviously, we are looking at different initiatives with our own coin that we could potentially put on a decentralized network for other of our industry participants to use. So there are multiple different ways that we are approaching this to create efficiencies for our clients going forward without introducing any additional risk to the system,” Duffy concluded. Duffy also stated in the call that 2025 marked a “record-breaking year” for CME cryptocurrency trading, with daily volume up 92% in Q4 2025 to $13 billion. For context, Hyperliquid, the leading decentralized perpetuals exchange, traded $13.08 billion in volume over the last 24 hours, excluding its HIP-3 markets. Traditional financial institutions continue to dive headfirst into crypto and crypto-adjacent products, including tokenized money market funds , native blockchain launches , and investments .
